title: Promo series expiry
body:
The support article on ranked play states that plat promotion series need to be completed within 28 days, and diamond promotion series need to be completed with 5 days or they expire.

Which rule does the Plat 1->diamond 5 promotion series fall under? Is it the 28 day expiry since during the series you are still a platinum player, and so in that sense it's a plat series, or is it the 5 day expiry rule since it's a promotion series to diamond, and so it's a diamond series?

replies.body: You should have 28 days to complete your series before it expires while Platinum 1.  The required date will change only after reaching Diamond 5.  Good luck!
